{{cpp/regex/regex_iterator/title|operator*,operator-&gt;}}
{{cpp/regex/regex_iterator/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++11|1= 
const value_type&amp; operator*() const;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++11|1=
const value_type* operator-&gt;() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Extracts the current {{lc|std::match_results}} from a {{tt|regex_iterator}}.

===Return value===
@1@ Returns a reference to the current {{lc|std::match_results}}.
@2@ Returns a pointer to the current {{lc|std::match_results}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;regex&gt;
#include &lt;string&gt;
 
int main()
{
    std::string hay{"1.1a2b3cjk34"};
    std::regex needle("[1234]");
    using Ri = std::regex_iterator&lt;std::string::iterator&gt;;
    for (Ri it{hay.begin(), hay.end(), needle}, last{}; it != last; ++it)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; it-&gt;str();
    std::cout &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output= 112334
}}
